CustomField.formula: IF(Date_of_Stage_On_Hold__c <> null || Phase_3_Start_Date__c = null, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQT9", "Grey"), IF(Phase_3_Days_Left__c < 7, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQTB", "Red"), IF(Phase_3_Days_Left__c > 14, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQT8", "Green"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQTA", "Yellow"))))
CustomField.label: Phase 3 (Train) Color
